20110126215542.000|20110126215544.000|TR0|until at least the age of 25.  I've spoken 
20110126215544.000|20110126215547.000|TR0|to Sanjay Gupta about this.  But the 
20110126215547.000|20110126215549.000|TR0|bottom line is, you know, my personal view 
20110126215549.000|20110126215552.000|TR0|is, no, of course not.  But the law does 
20110126215552.000|20110126215554.000|TR0|provide that he can be tried as an adult.
20110126215554.000|20110126215556.000|TR0|
20110126215556.000|20110126215559.000|TR0|BALDWIN:  Well, we know that his lawyers, 
20110126215559.000|20110126215601.000|TR0|Brown's lawyers, were back in court 
20110126215601.000|20110126215603.000|TR0|yesterday.  They're asking the judge to 
20110126215603.000|20110126215606.000|TR0|try him as a juvenile.
20110126215606.000|20110126215608.000|TR0|
20110126215608.000|20110126215611.000|TR0|What do you think the chances are that the 
20110126215611.000|20110126215613.000|TR0|judge will actually grant that request?
20110126215613.000|20110126215615.000|TR0|
20110126215615.000|20110126215618.000|TR0|HOSTIN:  I actually think that the chances 
20110126215618.000|20110126215620.000|TR0|are pretty slim, actually.  I mean, a 
20110126215620.000|20110126215622.000|TR0|three-judge panel is reviewing this case, 
20110126215622.000|20110126215625.000|TR0|a three-judge panel of the Superior Court. 
20110126215625.000|20110126215627.000|TR0| But because there is precedent, and there 
20110126215627.000|20110126215629.000|TR0|are so many people serving these prison

20110126215632.000|20110126215634.000|TR0|under the age of 13 -- 18, rather, I 
20110126215634.000|20110126215637.000|TR0|wouldn't be surprised if he were to be 
20110126215637.000|20110126215639.000|TR0|tried as an adult in this case.
20110126215639.000|20110126215641.000|TR0|
20110126215641.000|20110126215644.000|TR0|BALDWIN:  I want to move on to this next 
20110126215644.000|20110126215646.000|TR0|case.
20110126215646.000|20110126215648.000|TR0|
20110126215648.000|20110126215651.000|TR0|A 27-year-old police officer in Houston is 
20110126215651.000|20110126215653.000|TR0|accused of arresting a woman, handcuffing 
20110126215653.000|20110126215656.000|TR0|her, taking her to a dark place, raping 
20110126215656.000|20110126215658.000|TR0|her while he was on duty, wearing his 
20110126215658.000|20110126215700.000|TR0|uniform and using his squad car.  Here he 
20110126215700.000|20110126215703.000|TR0|is.
20110126215703.000|20110126215705.000|TR0|
20110126215705.000|20110126215707.000|TR0|Now, prosecutors say there could be even 
20110126215707.000|20110126215710.000|TR0|more victims.  We know he was in court 
20110126215710.000|20110126215712.000|TR0|yesterday asking a judge to reduce his 
20110126215712.000|20110126215715.000|TR0|$500,000 bond. Is $500,000 considered high 
20110126215715.000|20110126215717.000|TR0|for a case like this?
20110126215717.000|20110126215719.000|TR0|
20110126215719.000|20110126215722.000|TR0|HOSTIN:  You know, I don't think it's 
20110126215722.000|20110126215724.000|TR0|considered high.  Many people are saying 
20110126215724.000|20110126215726.000|TR0|that it's high, but it's $500,000.
20110126215726.000|20110126215729.000|TR0|
20110126215729.000|20110126215731.000|TR0|When judges consider bail, they consider a 
20110126215731.000|20110126215733.000|TR0|lot of circumstances, and one of the 
20110126215733.000|20110126215736.000|TR0|circumstances they consider, sort of the 
20110126215736.000|20110126215738.000|TR0|type of crime. And this was aggravated 
20110126215738.000|20110126215741.000|TR0|sexual assault.  They also consider the 
20110126215741.000|20110126215743.000|TR0|circumstances.  He's a police officer, so 
20110126215743.000|20110126215745.000|TR0|he would have been abusing his police 
20110126215745.000|20110126215748.000|TR0|position if indeed he committed these 
20110126215748.000|20110126215750.000|TR0|crimes.
20110126215750.000|20110126215752.000|TR0|
20110126215752.000|20110126215755.000|TR0|And they also look at risk of flight.  In 
20110126215755.000|20110126215757.000|TR0|this case, apparently he has four 
20110126215757.000|20110126215800.000|TR0|passports, one of which is an Indian 
20110126215800.000|20110126215802.000|TR0|passport, so he is certainly a risk of 
20110126215802.000|20110126215804.000|TR0|flight.  A $500,000 bail in this case I 
20110126215804.000|20110126215807.000|TR0|think is almost a gift.
20110126215807.000|20110126215809.000|TR0|
20110126215809.000|20110126215811.000|TR0|BALDWIN:  Well, is he jailed -- a $500,000 
20110126215811.000|20110126215814.000|TR0|bond?  Would that be because it's a 
20110126215814.000|20110126215816.000|TR0|separate situation, because he's in a

20110126215821.000|20110126215823.000|TR0|   HOSTIN:  Yes.  I mean, absolutely.  And 
20110126215823.000|20110126215826.000|TR0|it is something that has to be considered,

20110126215828.000|20110126215830.000|TR0|of the crime, and whether or not he's a 
20110126215830.000|20110126215833.000|TR0|risk flight.  The fact that if he did this 
20110126215833.000|20110126215835.000|TR0|while on duty, while dressed as a police
